hero.title: Broadcast-Ready Metadata in Seconds
hero.subtitle: Transform messy rosters into production-ready athlete data with AI-powered normalization

aiNormalization.title: AI Normalization
aiNormalization.desc: Instantly parses messy text from PDF scrapes, websites, and emails with 99.9% accuracy.

multiFormat.title: Multi-Format Export
multiFormat.desc: Export to CSV, JSON, XML, or direct integrations with Ross, Vizrt, and Daktronics.

teamBranding.title: Auto Team Branding
teamBranding.desc: Automatically fetches logos and colors for 500+ pro/college teams.

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.desc: Push updates to Dropbox, Google Drive, or S3 buckets in real-time.

versionControl.title: Version Control
versionControl.desc: Track every change with full audit trails and rollback capabilities.

realtime.title: Real-time Sync
realtime.desc: Push updates directly to your production folders or cloud buckets in seconds.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your workflow

q1.question: How accurate is the AI extraction?
q1.answer: Our AI achieves 99.9% accuracy on standard roster formats. For edge cases, you can manually correct any fields before export.

q2.question: What file formats can I import?
q2.answer: We support PDF, Word docs, Excel, plain text, and even screenshots. Just paste or upload, and we'll handle the rest.

q3.question: Can I export for Ross Xpression or Vizrt?
q3.answer: Yes. Our Network tier includes direct exports for Ross DataLinq (XML/CSV) and Vizrt DataCenter, including automatic accent removal and case normalization.

q4.question: Do you store my data?
q4.answer: All rosters are encrypted and stored securely. You can delete your data anytime from Settings.
